    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jButton1ActionPerformed
       
         String path="jdbc:mysql://localhost/";
         String place="librarydb";
      
         int flag=0;
        /* if(jTextField1.getText().equalsIgnoreCase(""))
       {
          
           JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,"Enter student ID");
       }
     else  if(jTextField2.getText().equalsIgnoreCase("")&& jTextField3.getText().equalsIgnoreCase(""))
       {
          
           JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,"Enter a book ID");
       }
       
      else
     {*/
         try
         {
             Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
             Connection myconnection=DriverManager.getConnection( path+place,"root","");
               
             String query="select * from addmembertbl where id='"+jTextField1.getText()+"'";
             PreparedStatement mystatement=myconnection.prepareStatement(query);
             ResultSet myresult=mystatement.executeQuery();
              if(!myresult.next())
              { 
                  flag=1;
                  JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,"Invalid student ID");
              }
              
              else{
              String query1="select * from addbooktbl where id='"+jTextField2.getText()+"'";
             PreparedStatement mystatement1=myconnection.prepareStatement(query1);
             ResultSet myresult1=mystatement1.executeQuery();
              if(!myresult1.next())
              {
                  flag=1;
                  JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,"Invalid book1 ID");
              }
              
              }
          /*   if(!jTextField3.getText().equalsIgnoreCase(""))
             {
             String query3="select * from addbooktbl where id='"+jTextField3.getText()+"'";
             PreparedStatement mystatement3=myconnection.prepareStatement(query3);
             ResultSet myresult3=mystatement3.executeQuery();
              if(!myresult3.next())
              {
                  flag=1;
                  JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,"Invalid book2 ID");
              }
             }
            */  
             if(flag==0)
             {
             String query2="insert into issuebooktbl values(?,?,?)";
             
             PreparedStatement mystatement2=myconnection.prepareStatement(query2);
     
            mystatement2.setString(1,jTextField1.getText());
      
            mystatement2.setString(2,jTextField2.getText());
           // mystatement2.setString(3,jTextField3.getText());
            
        
        String Dob=jComboBox3.getSelectedItem()+"-"+jComboBox2.getSelectedItem()+"-"+jComboBox1.getSelectedItem();
        mystatement2.setString(3,Dob);
              
              
             
           mystatement2.execute();
           myconnection.close();
           JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,"book(s) issued successfully");
             }
         }
        catch(Exception e)
        {
             JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,"Error in query" + e.getMessage());
        }
        
        
     
    
        
    }//GEN-LAST:event_jButton1ActionPerformed

    private void formInternalFrameActivated(javax.swing.event.InternalFrameEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_formInternalFrameActivated
       for(int x=1; x<=31; x++)
        {
            jComboBox1.addItem(x);
        }
        
        for(int x=1; x<=12; x++)
        {
            jComboBox2.addItem(x);
        }
        
        for(int x=2010; x<=2020; x++)
        {
            jComboBox3.addItem(x);
        }
    }//GEN-LAST:event_formInternalFrameActivated

    private void jButton2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jButton2ActionPerformed
        jTextField1.setText("");
        jTextField2.setText("");
        jComboBox1.setSelectedIndex(0);
        jComboBox2.setSelectedIndex(0);
        jComboBox3.setSelectedIndex(0);
    }//GEN-LAST:event_jButton2ActionPerformed

    private javax.swing.JButton jButton1;

    private javax.swing.JComboBox jComboBox2;
    private javax.swing.JComboBox jComboBox3;
    private javax.swing.JLabel jLabel1;
    private javax.swing.JLabel jLabel2;
    private javax.swing.JLabel jLabel3;
    private javax.swing.JTextField jTextField1;
    private javax.swing.JTextField jTextField2;

}
